revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox battle item |name = Spell Tag |image = [[File:Spell Tag.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of the ''Spell Tag'' |location = [[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Spell Tags''' is a type of [[Held Items|Held Item]] that can only be equipped to [[File:Ghost_Type_icon.png|30px]]Ghost type Pokémon. ==Details== Raises the attack of the Pokémon holding the Item by 10%. ==Acquistion== {{Loot/head‎|Battle items}} {{LootItem|Mt Silver|Legendar..."
